rules.description: shift+cmd+l types javascript: and hits enter hack

to_if_held_down.shell_command: osascript -e 'tell application "Keyboard Maestro Engine" to do script "Activate Clipboard History Switcher"'

rules.description: Window Manipulation mode -> n (Spectacle move current window to next monitor)
Window Manipulation mode -> e (Spectacle shrink current window)

to.shell_command: osascript -e 'tell application "Keyboard Maestro Engine" to do script "hotkey: window_manipulation_mode+e"'
osascript -e 'tell application "Keyboard Maestro Engine" to do script "hotkey: window_manipulation_mode+e"'

rules.description: Window Manipulation mode -> r (Spectacle grow current window)

to.shell_command: osascript -e 'tell application "Keyboard Maestro Engine" to do script "hotkey: window_manipulation_mode+r"'
osascript -e 'tell application "Keyboard Maestro Engine" to do script "hotkey: window_manipulation_mode+r"'

rules.description: Window Manipulation mode -> - (Spectacle shrink vim split vertically)

to.shell_command: osascript -e 'tell application "Keyboard Maestro Engine" to do script "hotkey: window_manipulation_mode+hyphen"'
osascript -e 'tell application "Keyboard Maestro Engine" to do script "hotkey: window_manipulation_mode+hyphen"'

rules.description: Window Manipulation mode -> = (Spectacle equalize vim splits)

to.shell_command: osascript -e 'tell application "Keyboard Maestro Engine" to do script "hotkey: window_manipulation_mode+equal_sign"'
osascript -e 'tell application "Keyboard Maestro Engine" to do script "hotkey: window_manipulation_mode+equal_sign"'

rules.description: Window Manipulation mode -> delete (Spectacle grow vim split vertically)

to.shell_command: osascript -e 'tell application "Keyboard Maestro Engine" to do script "hotkey: window_manipulation_mode+equal_sign"'
osascript -e 'tell application "Keyboard Maestro Engine" to do script "hotkey: window_manipulation_mode+equal_sign"'

osascript -e 'tell application "Keyboard Maestro Engine" to do script "hotkey: window_manipulation_mode+delete_or_backspace"'

rules.description: Window Manipulation mode -> return_or_enter (Spectacle maximize current window)
Window Manipulation mode -> caps_lock (Spectacle center current window)
Window Manipulation mode -> t (Spectacle resize current window to a third of the screen)
Window Manipulation mode -> h (Spectacle resize current window to left half of the screen)
Window Manipulation mode -> j (Spectacle resize current window to bottom half of the screen)
Window Manipulation mode -> k (Spectacle resize current window to upper half of the screen)
Window Manipulation mode -> l (Spectacle resize current window to right half of the screen)
Window Manipulation mode -> i (Spectacle resize current window to upper-left half of the screen)
Window Manipulation mode -> o (Spectacle resize current window to upper-right half of the screen)
Window Manipulation mode -> , (Spectacle resize current window to bottom-left half of the screen)
Window Manipulation mode -> . (Spectacle resize current window to bottom-right half of the screen)
Utilities mode n -> Toggle Noizio on/off
Utilities mode b -> Switch WIFI to BLUESSO

to.shell_command: osascript -e 'tell application "Keyboard Maestro Engine" to do script "Wifi -> BLUESSO"'
osascript -e 'tell application "Keyboard Maestro Engine" to do script "Wifi -> BLUESSO"'
